name: Monkey Madness
description:
Monkey Madness is a high intensity roller coaster ride through the most hidden parts of the Jungle, engaging your senses to the fast tempo techno beat sending you flying past obstacles in a neon blur. The art style adds a minimalistic blocky character to the game that is highlighted with vibrant eye catching colour to draw in full attention.

Created By:

Samuel Wilson

Mitchell Dixon

Thomas Mcdonald

Oliver Neale

Jordon Peach

Alex Betson
